price: (Àwọn ni) àwọn tó ń ṣẹ́rí àwọn ènìyàn kúrò lójú ọ̀nà (ẹ̀sìn) Allāhu, wọ́n sì ń fẹ́ kó wọ́. Àwọn sì ni aláìgbàgbọ́ nínú Ọjọ́ Ìkẹ́yìn.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجٗا وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wayabghūnahā ʿiwajan wahum bil-ākhirati kāfirūna
